attributes.action: provide legislation in Northern Ireland which will allow for the closing of roads on all future Belfast Marathon routes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Demand that participants safety is guaranteed by closing roads during the Belfast Marathon.  Also encourage organisation committee to provide bottled water throughout the course instead of water from standpipes etc.  Finally seek assurances from said committee to 'listen' and act upon all constructive feedback.
